1.0.name: wordpress/livejournal-crossposter-remake
1.0.description:
Automatically copies all posts to a LiveJournal or other LiveJournal-based blog (exclude text in shortcode [nocrosspost]smth[/nocrosspost] - buttons for it added in visual&html editors). Editing or deleting a post will be replicated as well. Crosspost entry privacy depends on: 1. WP custom post field 'ljxp_privacy' value. It can be 'public', 'friends' or 'private'. 2. If 'ljxp_privacy' not set, plugin will use post visibility settings: public = public, password protected = friends only, private = only me. Please notice that by default private entries wouldnt be crossposted at all. Optionally adds link to crossposted LiveJournal post.

Original plugins by Arseniy Ivanov, Evan Broder and Sergey M.
